name: Facebook - black + transparent

style_settings.label: add the Facebook logo to the login page?

style_setting_options.label: yes
style_setting_options.value:
._5iyx, img.img:nth-child(2),._5iyx{opacity:.0!important}
  ._5iyy  {background: url(/*[[log]]*/) no-repeat scroll 0% 0% transparent !important;background-size: contain !important;transform: scale(1.6,1.6) !important;background-position:bottom!important;margin-top:170px!important;margin-left:-100px!important;opacity:.9!important}
